comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: Caversham is now a suburb of Reading, in Berkshire. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caversham,_Berkshire It is the site of the BBC Monitoring Service en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BBC_Monitoring

comment.author: 8874887@N07
comment._content:
This (and other adjoining pictures in the set) would better be described as 'Home Counties' rather than 'London and Suburbs'.

London suburbs are well within the London area.  The home counties surround the London area, but are sufficiently far enough away to warrant their own identity.

BTW, you're doing a great job.  Nice to see pictures like these all in one place.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information and the kind words. We'll look into it and adjust the description when we next update.
